content.title: Game Ideas
content: • Convert text based game into a small 3D adventure
• Game for the nephew with bright colors and fun sounds?
• left side block continue to fall (fill up your screen and you lose)
• make a big combo on the left side creates pieces on the left side
• build the right side into "attacks" that smash your opponents blocks
